pageTitle.en: Quality Control & Supply Chain Audits | Asia Inspection - Global Services
pageTitle.es: Control de Calidad: Inspecciones, Auditorias de Fábrica y Test de Laboratorio | Asiainspection.es
pageTitle.ar: فحص داخل مصانع الصين | خدمات الاستيرات من الصين | فحص منتجات ومصانع الصين
pageTitle.fr: Contrôle Qualité : Test en Laboratoire, Contrôle Produit, Audit Fournisseur et Social | AsiaInspection.fr
pageTitle.zh: 实验室测试，产品检验和工厂审核
pageTitle.de: AsiaInspection, firmen audit, qualitätskontrolle produktion, fabrik inspektion
pageTitle.it: AsiaInspection : Controllo Qualità produzione, Ispezioni fabbrica
pageTitle.pt: Controle de qualidade: serviços de Inspeções de produtos, testes laboratoriais, auditoria social e de fábrica | AsiaInspection.pt
pageTitle.ru: Контроль качества в Китае и Азии: лабораторное тестирование, тестирование продукции, аудит фабрик и социальный аудит | AsiaInspection.ru
pageTitle.tr: Kalite Control ve Tedarik Zinciri Denetimleri | Asia Inspection - Global Services

pageDesc.en: On-site supplier audit programs, product inspections and laboratory tests for global brands, retailers and importers. Secure and manage your supply chain here.
pageDesc.es: Asia Inspection ofrece servicios de inspección y control de calidad.
pageDesc.ar: نحن نوفر خدمات الاستيراد من الصين، فحص المنتجات داخل مصانع الصين وبلاد آسيا.
pageDesc.fr: AsiaInspection réalise des Contrôles Qualité et exécute des Audits Fournisseurs pour des importations sûres
pageDesc.zh: Asia Inspection 提供质量控制（QC）服务，并提供在线工具，用于管理您亚洲的质量检测和工厂审核。
pageDesc.it: AsiaInspection, specialista nell'Audit delle aziende e nella Ispezioni di fabbrica, vi propone servizi specifici per il controllo della qualità di produzione
pageDesc.ru: AsiaInspection предлагает инспекции по контролю качества. Стоимость пакета услуг.
pageDesc.pt: Programas de auditoria de fornecedores no local, inspeções de produtos e testes de laboratório para as marcas internacionais, retalhistas e importadores. Proteja e gira a sua cadeia de fornecimento aqui.
pageDesc.tr: Küresel markalar, perakendeciler ve ithalatçılar için sahada denetim programları, ürün denetimleri ve laboratuvar testleri. Burada tedarik zincirinizi güvenceye alın ve yönetin.

pageKeywords.en: quality control asia, china qc, asia inspection
pageKeywords.zh: CPSIA测试, GB6675测试, REACH测试, SASO认证, 玩具检测机构, 纺织品实验室检测, 服装检测机构, 玩具测试标准, 玩具测试服务, 玩具测试公司, 眼镜检测机构, 眼镜质量检测, 眼镜检测服务, 第三方质量检测公司, 社会责任审核, sedex验厂, 质量控制, 生产检验, AsiaInspection, 亚洲供应商, 质量检测人员, 生产中检验, asianinspection, 玩具检测, 可接受质量水平标准表格, BSCI审核, BSCI认证, BSCI报告, 沙特认证, 沙特清关, SASO发证机构, BSCI Audit

section1.title:
We Bring Trust and
Ethical Standards to Trade Globally
section1.subTitle: AI performs on-site supplier audit programs, product inspections and laboratory tests for global brands, retailers and importers to secure and manage their supply chain.
section1.TryService: Create Your Free Account and Try the Service

box.title: Comprehensive Online & Mobile Management
box.content: Manage your product and supplier compliance from your online account. Use the AI app when on the go!

box.title: Leading Turnaround & Flexibility
box.content: Onsite within 48 hours. Reports the same day. Cancel up to 4pm the day before.

box.title: Supply Chain Intelligence
box.content: Use your real-time dashboard to benchmark and identify your high performing suppliers.

box.title: Product Expertise
box.content: Over 1,000 off-the-shelf customizable product-specific inspection checklists.

section3.title: Services by Industry
section3.contents:
AsiaInspection has over 1,000 inspectors, auditors and lab experts specialized by industry to ensure your product and suppliers meet all safety and performance standards for your destination market.

Access hundreds of off-the-shelf customizable inspection checklists online, receive expert advice on your product safety requirements and supplier auditing programs to ensure compliance at the source.

box.title: Product Inspections
box.content: Verify your product meets all specifications in the factory.

box.title: Supplier Audit Programs
box.content: Engage with capable and ethical suppliers.

box.title: Laboratory Testing
box.content: Ensure compliance with safety standards: REACH, RoHS, EN71, CPSIA...

section5.title: Retailers and Importers from 120 Countries Trust AI with their Supply Chain
section5.subTitle: Satisfied Customers Worldwide

section5.title: Retailers and Importers from 120 Countries Trust AI with their Supply Chain
section5.subTitle: Satisfied Customers Worldwide

section1.title:
Nous apportons confiance et éthique
au commerce international
section1.subTitle: AI réalise des programmes d’audit fournisseur, des inspections de produit et des tests en laboratoire pour les marques, distributeurs et importateurs qui souhaitent contrôler et sécuriser leur chaîne d’approvisionnement.
section1.TryService: Créez votre compte gratuit et testez le service

box.title: Gestion en ligne et mobile
box.content: Gérez la conformité de vos produits et de vos fournisseurs depuis votre compte en ligne. Utilisez l'app AI lors de vos déplacements !

box.title: Rapidité et flexibilité
box.content: Sur site dans les 48 heures. Rapport le même jour. Annulation jusqu'à 16 heures le jour précédent.

box.title: Données de Supply Chain
box.content: Utilisez votre tableau de bord en temps réel pour comparer vos meilleurs fournisseurs.

box.title: Expertise produit
box.content: Plus de 1 000 listes de contrôle d'inspection personnalisables spécifiques au produit.

section3.title: Services par Industrie
section3.contents: AsiaInspection dispose de plus de 900 inspecteurs, auditeurs et experts techniques spécialisés par industrie afin de vous assurer que votre produit et vos fournisseurs respectent toutes les normes de sécurité et de performance de votre marché de destination.

box.title: Inspection produits
box.content: Vérifiez que votre produit répond à toutes les spécifications directement à l'usine.

box.title: Programmes d'audit fournisseur
box.content: Travaillez avec des fournisseurs compétents et éthiques.

box.title: Test en laboratoire
box.content: Veillez au respect des normes de sécurité : REACH, RoHS, EN71, CPSIA...

section5.title: Des marques et importateurs de 120 pays font confiance à AI pour leur chaîne logistique
section5.subTitle: Témoignages Clients

section1.title:
我们为全球贸易带来
信任与道德标准
section1.subTitle: AI亚检为全球品牌商、零售商和进口商提供供应商审核、产品验货及实验室测试服务，确保其供应链安全可靠。
section1.TryService: Create Your Free Account and Try the Service

box.title: 线上及移动端订单管理
box.content: 通过在线账户，对产品和供应商的合规性进行管理。随时随地使用AI亚检应用程序！

box.title: 高效运转与灵活变通
box.content: 48小时内抵达现场。当日提供验货报告。预约时间前一天16:00前可随时取消预约。

box.title: 智能供应链管理
box.content: 使用实时操作面板来衡量并确定高绩效供应商。

box.title: 专业产品知识
box.content: 1000多份现成的可定制特定产品检验清单。

section3.title: 行业分类服务
section3.contents:
AsiaInspection拥有800 多名验货员、审核员和机械工程专家，按行业专门分类，以确保产品和供应商满足目标市场的安全和性能标准。

您可在线浏览数百份可定制特定产品检测清单，确保产品来源的合规性。。

box.title: 产品检验
box.content: 工厂实地检验您的产品是否符合全部规格。

box.title: 供应商审核项目
box.content: 与提供高品质，符合道德标准的供应商合作。

box.title: 实验室测试
box.content: 确保产品符合中国及欧盟安全标准，测试项目包括REACH、RoHS、EN71、CPSIA

section5.title: 来自120个国家的零售商和进口商信任AI亚检对其供应链的检测
section5.subTitle: 全球各地的客户都对我们赞誉有加

section1.title: Trazemos Confiança e Padrões Sociais ao Comércio Internacional
section1.subTitle: A AsiaInspection realiza programas de auditoria de fornecedores no local, inspeções de produtos e testes de laboratório para as marcas internacionais, retalhistas e importadores, assegurando e gerenciando suas redes de fornecimento.
section1.TryService: Crie A Sua Conta Gratuita e Experimente o Serviço

box.title: Gestão Online & Móvel
box.content: Gerencie seu produto e a conformidade do seu fornecedor através da sua conta online. Utilize o app AI em movimento!

box.title: Rapidez & Flexibilidade
box.content: No local em até 48 horas. Relatório no próprio dia. Cancelamento até às 16h do dia anterior.

box.title: Dados da Rede de Fornecimento
box.content: Utilize o seu painel de controle para comparar os seus melhores fornecedores em tempo real.

box.title: Experiência com o Produto
box.content: Mais de 1,000 listas específicas e personalizáveis de controle de produtos.

section3.title: Serviços por Indústria
section3.contents:
A AsiaInspection tem mais de 1,500 inspetores, auditores e especialistas de laboratório especializados por indústria, garantindo que seu produto e seus fornecedores cumpram com todas as normas de segurança e desempenho para o seu mercado.

Acesso a centenas de listas padrão e personalizáveis de controle. Receba conselhos de especialistas sobre os requisitos de segurança para os seus produtos e programas de auditoria de fornecedores, assegurando o cumprimento na própria fonte.

box.title: Inspeções de Produto
box.content: Comprove na fábrica que o seu produto cumpre com todas as especificações.

box.title: Programas de Auditoria de Fornecedores
box.content: Contrate fornecedores competentes e éticos.

box.title: Teste de Laboratório
box.content: Garantia de cumprimento das normas de segurança: REACH, RoHS, EN71, CPSIA...

section5.title: Retailers and Importers from 120 Countries Trust AI with their Supply Chain
section5.subTitle: Satisfied Customers Worldwide

section1.title: Global Ticaret için Güven ve Ahlaki Standartları Getiriyoruz
section1.subTitle: AI küresel markalar, perakendeciler ve ithalatçıların tedarik zincirlerini güvenceye almaları ve yönetmeleri için sahada denetim programları, ürün denetimleri ve laboratuvar testleri yürütmektedir.
section1.TryService: Ücretsiz Hesabınızı Oluşturun ve Hizmeti Deneyin

box.title: Çevrimiçi ve Mobil Yönetim
box.content: Ürün ve tedarikçi uyumunuzu çevrimiçi hesabınızdan yönetin. İş başındayken AI uygulamasını kullanın!

box.title: Önemli Geri Dönüş ve Esneklik
box.content: 48 saat içinde yerinde. Aynı gün raporlar. Önceki gün saat 16:00'ya kadar iptal.

box.title: Tedarik Zinciri İstihbaratı
box.content: Yüksek performanslı tedarikçilerinizi değerlendirmek ve belirlemek için gerçek zamanı kontrol panelinizi kullanın.

box.title: Ürün Ekspertizi
box.content: 1000'in üzerinde hazır, kişiselleştirilebilir ürüne özel denetim kontrol listeleri.

section3.title: Sanayiye göre Hizmetler
section3.contents:
AsiaInspection hedef piyasanız için, ürün ve tedarikçilierinizin tüm güvenlik ve performans standartlarını karşılaması için endüstriye göre uzmanlaşmış 1500'ün üzerinde müfettiş, denetçi ve laboratuvar uzmanına sahiptir.

Yüzlerce kişiselleştirilebilir denetim kontrol listelerine çevrimiçi erişin, kaynağında uygunluğu sağlamak için ürün güvenliği gereksinimleriniz ve tedarikçi denetim programları hakkında uzman tavsiyesi alın.

box.title: Ürün Denetimleri
box.content: Ürününüzün fabrikanın tüm şartnamelerini karşıladığını doğrulayın.

box.title: Tedarikçi Denetim Programları
box.content: Yetenekli ve ahlaklı tedarikçiler kullanın.

box.title: Laboratuvar Testi
box.content: Güvenlik standartlarına uyum sağlayın: REACH, RoHS, EN71, CPSIA, vb.

section5.title: Retailers and Importers from 120 Countries Trust AI with their Supply Chain
section5.subTitle: Satisfied Customers Worldwide

section1.title:
Мы привносим доверие и
этические нормы в глобальную торговлю
section1.subTitle: AI осуществляет аудит поставщиков на местах, инспекцию продукции и лабораторные тесты для глобальных брендов, предприятий розничной торговли и импортеров для обеспечения безопасности и управления цепочкой поставок.
section1.TryService: Создайте бесплатную учетную запись и попробуйте наши услуги

box.title: Управление с мобильного телефона и онлайн
box.content: Управляйте соответствием своей продукции и поставщиков через учетную запись онлайн. Используйте приложение AI, когда вы в поездке!

box.title: Leading Turnaround & Flexibility
box.content: Onsite within 48 hours. Reports the same day. Cancel up to 4pm the day before.

box.title: Supply Chain Intelligence
box.content: Use your real-time dashboard to benchmark and identify your high performing suppliers.

box.title: Product Expertise
box.content: Over 1,000 off-the-shelf customizable product-specific inspection checklists.

section3.title: Услуги для каждой отрасли
section3.contents:
AsiaInspection has over 1,000 inspectors, auditors and lab experts specialized by industry to ensure your product and suppliers meet all safety and performance standards for your destination market.

Access hundreds of off-the-shelf customizable inspection checklists online, receive expert advice on your product safety requirements and supplier auditing programs to ensure compliance at the source.

box.title: Инспекция продукции
box.content: Проверяйте прямо на фабрике, соответствует ли ваша продукция техническим требованиям.

box.title: Программы аудита поставщиков
box.content: Работайте со знающими и этичными поставщиками.

box.title: Лабораторные тесты
box.content: Удостоверьтесь в соблюдении норм безопасности: REACH, RoHS, EN71, CPSIA и т. д.

section5.title: Retailers and Importers from 120 Countries Trust AI with their Supply Chain
section5.subTitle: Satisfied Customers Worldwide
